body.name: Cute Wooden Ultrasound Picture Frame - Beautiful Double Sided Sign For The Announcement of Your Pregnancy Or Baby's Birth - Nursery Decor Sonogram Photo Frame & Pregnancy Gift For First Time Moms
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 37 mins
features: Your Unique Keepsake Of A Truly Special Time: KIBAGAs’ double-sided ultrasound picture frames offer a super cute way to cherish the precious journey of becoming a parent by capturing & displaying a special pregnancy milestone - a true treasure for eternity!

Great For Adorable Pregnancy Announcements: Hooray, baby on its way - beautifully reveal the exciting news to your loved ones by using the gorgeous sonogram picture frame (including x2 pegs) showing the first tiny glimpses of your brand new family member to be

Create Lasting Memories: The baby picture frame set comes with a non-toxic, water based & baby-safe ink pad for you to stamp your newborns’ tiny hand or foot onto the frame easily. There is space to add all birth information - what a lovely birth announcement idea

The Prettiest & Most Heartwarming Decor: Designed with lots of love and made from durable plywood, the 8x6x0.23" ultrasound frame makes for an one-of-a-kind baby girl or baby boy nursery decor - a suitable wooden easel stand is included

A Fantastic Gift For Any Parents-To-Be: More than anything else, ultrasound pic frames show how delighted you are for someone & their growing family - and therefore are meaningful baby shower pregnancy gifts for first time moms & dads and for any expecting parents
body.description: KIBAGAs’ Ultrasound Picture Frame: A Wonderful Keepsake Of The Beginning Of Your Grand Family Adventure and a cute nursery decor! Madly in love at first sight. There’s magic in the air during pregnancy ultrasound sessions. When you see the first glimpses of your baby-to-be on the sonogram, it’s a moment you will never forget in your life. Thanks to KIBAGAs’ super cute ultrasound picture frame you are all set to cherish those special milestones in your lifes to the fullest and create a keepsake for eternity. What a joyous way to tell everyone: the best is yet to come - we made a baby! Use the beautifully designed picture frame to reveal the exciting news to your loved ones. The 8x6x0.23" frame is made of durable plywood. Featuring x2 pegs for you to easily attach the ultrasound picture and a wooden easel for displaying the gem around your home nicely, e. g. as baby boy or baby girl nursery decor later on. Hooray, welcome to the world! Has your bundle of joy finally arrived? Be sure to share it with everyone - thanks to the adorable baby announcement opportunity on the back side of the ultrasound picture frame it’ll definitely be a cuteness overload! Add all birth information (name of your little bundle of joy, date & time of birth, as well as weight and length) to the wooden board (pen not included!), before you make the sweetest memory: use the included non-toxic, water based and baby-safe ink pad to stamp your newborns’ tiny foot or hand on the dedicated space. Take a snapshot, spread the news and enjoy the love shower from your friends & family. Hearts full of happiness, little miracles are on their way!

reviews.reviewText: First at all I would like to say that the details and quality are amazing. Also I appreciate the time that the seller took to personalize the little thank you card. Product is exactly as described and I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is such a charming and heartfelt way to celebrate the journey of pregnancy and the arrival of a new baby. This double-sided sign serves as a beautiful announcement for the pregnancy or birth, making it a wonderful addition to nursery decor. It's not just a sonogram photo frame but also a thoughtful pregnancy gift, especially perfect for first-time moms. Overall, I am happy with my purchase and will definitely be buying it for my friends and for any future mommas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but Flimsy
reviews.reviewText: Super cute and easy to assemble, but it is a little flimsy. We had this on our kitchen counter and anytime it got bumped the main piece would fall off the base and the base would disassemble. It’s super easy to put back together, just a little frustrating that it’s not more solid once assembled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute double-sided frame!
reviews.reviewText: This is a well-made, easy to assemble wooden frame that is perfect for displaying sonogram or picture of baby using adhesive clips on one side, and baby's footprints and birth details on the other side. It comes with clear instructions on set up, and is nicely boxed if you are gifting. One important thing to note is that no pen is included and it recommends NOT using permanent markers, oil-based pens, or pens containing solvents as they might harm, discolor, or smear the wood surface. It is recommended to test whatever you do decide to use in a small area. Personally, I plan to use vinyl and my Cricut- I have used both removeable, permanent, and heat transfer vinyl on similar wood products before and they have all worked beautifully.Also love the ink pad and how it is mess free for baby!!! Of course, if you print directly on the wood, you only get one shot at it, but they actually give you an extra set of adhesive clothespin-style clips, so you could also try doing footprints on a small piece of white cardstock and just clip it to the frame! Then you can have multiple attempts and choose the best print.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes a great gift or keepsake
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this product as a keep sake and it looks good. Fairly priced and cute so would make a good gift as well. It is well packaged and sturdy enough to stand. Assembly is easy and comes with instructions.
